bug.author: Wafaa-arbash
bug.summary: Google drive is showing empty folders even-though they are not empty
bug.description: I was trying to import a folder from my google drive, once I selected the folder, it shows "no item in this folder" <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/59834878/83071925-e55fd900-a03b-11ea-8170-6e8cf6d44024.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: When you're using the "Folders" filter, files won't show up
